In England, in the seven days to 28 January, there were 15,135 new confirmed cases (26.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 January, there were 12,695 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 19% (2,440 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 February is 20,535,061 (36,313 cases per 100,000 population).
